name: Professortomscales.github.io
body:
### Welcome!

This site contains information for my current and future students.

### Classes I Teach:

If you are thinking about taking any of my classes, check the links for information about the textbooks we will use and the work load you can expect. There are calendars of assignment due dates and information about the way I do things, and what I expect from my students as well.

### Academic Resources:

Materials to help you write better, improve your study-skills, and find information. There are also links to sites I use in my classes.

### Advising:

Information for my advisees about scheduling & registering for classes as well as planning for graduation.

### Software:

Links to useful & free software.

### Rate My Professors Website:

[Tom Scales' rating](http://ratemyprofessors.com/ShowRatings.jsp?tid=1457897)
[SVCC Alberta area instructor list](http://ratemyprofessors.com/SelectTeacher.jsp?sid=2846)
[SVCC Keysville area instructor list](http://ratemyprofessors.com/SelectTeacher.jsp?sid=5909)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
